caption.p: (A) Effects of NiO NPs and PLEO on CAT activity in A549 cells. Cells were treated with different concentrations for 24 h. H 2O 2 was used as a negative control. (B) PLEO attenuates NiO NPs decreased CAT activity. A549 cells were treated with different concentrations of essential oils for 24 h followed by NiO NPs for 24 h also. Data represented are mean ± SD of three independent experiments. * p < 0.05 treatments compared to control; ≠ p < 0.05 compared to NiO NPs.
